Sentencas: Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs) are regarded as a promising technology for economic power generation due to their high efficiency and large fuel flexibility.
Titulo: Differential analysis of SOFC current-voltage characteristics

Sentencas: Durability is a severe hurdle towards their deployment.
Titulo: Differential analysis of SOFC current-voltage characteristics

Sentencas: The near future targets in respect to Degradation Rate (DR) are about 0.1% kh(-1), which needs improved monitoring and diagnostics.
Titulo: Differential analysis of SOFC current-voltage characteristics

Sentencas: This work aims at introducing a new approach based on Differential Analysis of the i-V curves, named DiVA.
Titulo: Differential analysis of SOFC current-voltage characteristics

Sentencas: It operates with the Differential Resistance Rd and its evolution during long term testing.
Titulo: Differential analysis of SOFC current-voltage characteristics

Sentencas: Two new performance indicators are introduced.
Titulo: Differential analysis of SOFC current-voltage characteristics

Sentencas: Since derivatives are more sensitive to small deviations, the Differential Resistance Analysis (DRA) ensures increased sensitivity and information capability in respect to degradation monitoring and diagnostics, which is demonstrated on a small stack during thermal cycling conditions - before and after the first thermal cycle, on button cells tested up to 9000 h, as well as on button cells operating in fuel cell and in electrolysis mode.
Titulo: Differential analysis of SOFC current-voltage characteristics

Sentencas: The results show that DRA is several times more sensitive in comparison with the classical DR evaluation based on registration of the voltage decrease at constant current.
Titulo: Differential analysis of SOFC current-voltage characteristics
